title: The 35 Best-Reviewed Workout Clothes (That Happen to Be Under $40)
description: “Squat proof and comfy. Even my ex contacted me after posting this on my story.”
excerpt: We scoured Amazon for the best (and cutest) workout sets and clothes—because there’s nothing quite like a good outfit to incentivize ourselves to get moving.
text: Running Vest33,000ft Lightweight Running Vest If one of your resolutions going into the New Year involves getting more steps in (or joining a run club), you’ll need a warm vest to keep you going—especially as temperatures continue to dip.Sizes: XS-3XLMaterial: 100% PolyesterCustomer review: “I found this to be a fabulous soft shell vest. I wanted a hunter-orange vest for safety on walks and am pleasantly surprised at what a perfect layer this is.”Zip-Up Fleece HoodieTrendy Queen Zip Up Hoodies Fleece Few things compare to how comforting and snuggly a fleece hoodie can be. You’ll reach for it even when you’re not going to the gym.Sizes: S-XLMaterial: 50% Polyester, 50% CottonCustomer review: “Thick! Great quality. Super Soft and made very well. I purchased the beige, and I will definitely be trying another color soon. This item is a good price. Exactly as described. I washed and dried it as soon as it arrived. It launders well and no shrinking or peeling. The size is accurate. Perfect fit for a Small. I am 5’5” 115 lbs. it’s not too tight or too loose. The fit is as it should be. And the color is as pictured. I recommend buying this zip-up jacket. Perfect!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBiker ShortsBALEAF Biker Shorts with Pockets With over 55,000 five-star reviews, it’s safe to say that these shorts will be your new go-to pair. Customers rave about how soft they are and love the deep pockets, which are perfect for stashing your cell phone.Sizes: XS-3XLMaterial: 87% Polyester, 13% SpandexCustomer review: “I love absolutely everything about these shorts! You can tell by the feel that they choose quality fabrics, and they are super soft against the skin, the compression is great for everyday wear and working out! They’re very flattering, the length is just enough.”Tummy Control Leggings90 Degree By Reflex High Waist Tummy Control ShapewearThese leggings not only offer tummy control but they’re also super durable, meaning they won’t let you down or become translucent even after several washes. Sizes: XS-3XLMaterial: 87% Polyester, 13% SpandexCustomer review: “The are comfortable, soft, breathable, and just the right amount of elasticity. Perfect for wearing to the gym, going on walks, and around the house. Side note - I absolutely LOVE the little pocket on the belly - perfect for holding a key and ID for the gym (not a great size for your phone though.)”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowQuick Dry Top Real Essentials Quick Dry Fit Athletic TopYou can never have too many tees, especially when you can wear them to yoga and to run errands. These come in a pack of five so you won’t run out, even when you skip laundry for a few extra days.Sizes: S-XLMaterial: 90% Polyester, 10% SpandexCustomer review: “I was skeptical about the quality for the price of these but they have far exceeded my expectations! They’re soft but sweat resistant and the colors are exactly as described. The material is thin but I live in a super humid climate, so this worked great for me.”Long-Sleeve Tennis DressHiverlay Long Sleeve Tennis DressesFor those days when you can’t get an indoor court to play doubles, a long-sleeved tennis dress is a must. This one has built-in pockets and an adjustable half-zip collar to keep you comfortable. Sizes: S-XLMaterial: 90% Polyester, 10% SpandexCustomer review: “I was skeptical about the quality for the price of these but they have far exceeded my expectations! They’re soft but sweat-resistant, and the colors are exactly as described. The material is thin, but I live in a super humid climate, so this worked great for me.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFleece LeggingsCRZ YOGA Thermal Fleece Lined LeggingsThese fleece-lined leggings are so thin that you can even wear them under other pants as a thermal layer. Sizes: XS-LMaterial: Fleece Lined Thermal Fabric: 87% Polyamide,13% SpandexCustomer review: “My new winter must-have! At 5’4” and 128 lbs, the size small fits me perfectly—not too tight and not too loose. The 28-inch length is great, hitting just at my ankles, making them ideal for workouts, hiking, or just staying cozy during the colder months. The fleece lining is soft and warm without being bulky, and the leggings provide excellent stretch and comfort. I love the high-waisted design, which stays put during movement and adds a flattering touch. They’re also super versatile—great for yoga, running errands, or even layering under jeans on extra chilly days.”Ski PantsBenBoy Fleece Slim Cargo Snow Ski Hiking PantsSkiing absolutely qualifies as a workout, and this pair of cargo pants is perfect for both hitting the slopes and tackling hiking trails. Even if you don’t make it to the mountain, they’re ideal for enjoying the great outdoors.Sizes: XS-LMaterial: Fleece Lined Thermal Fabric: 87% Polyamide,13% SpandexCustomer review: “I’m super picky with pants, and these impressed me. They're super comfortable, warm, and versatile. They look great when worn casually or for winter sports. The inner lining keeps me warm and is non-irritating. Lots of pockets that fit my phone. Comes with a cute and adjustable belt. Won't make noise when walking. Material is waterproof and can be worn in snowy conditions. I don't want to take them off. Super happy with these pants. Would recommend.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSeamless Long-Sleeve Top MathCat Seamless Workout Shirt Long Sleeve Yoga Before you even begin to entertain the idea of exercising outside, you’ll need a warm base layer. This long-sleeve workout top is seamless, so it won’t peek through anything you layer on top.Sizes: XS-LMaterial: 90% Nylon, 10% ElastaneCustomer review: “I love the material, feel, color, and fit of these longsleeves. They are definitely heavy enough to be a baselayer, and hold up GREAT. Perfect for any fitness activity or just hanging around. I'm actually wearing my light blue one right now LOL. It's that good!"Mesh LeggingsTrainingGirl Mesh High Waisted Yoga Pants Shake things up from the norm by swapping out your usual black leggings for this pair that features mesh paneling.Sizes: XS-LMaterial: 90% Nylon, 10% ElastaneCustomer review: “I tried them on and don’t ever want to take them off again, these are the comfiest leggings I’ve had, the fabric is really soft and resistant they allow you to move freely ant they are really flattering to your body."Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowOne-Shoulder SetAoxjox Asymmetric Sports Bras If you’re tired of wearing the same old black sports bra to the gym, mix things up with a one-shoulder set that comes in over 20 colors, just in case you want to coordinate your sneakers to your outfit.Sizes: XXS-3XMaterial: 75% Nylon, 25% SpandexCustomer review: “Not only do I get SO many compliments when I wear this but it is very supportive (I do lots of HIIT work-outs). Have had this product for about a year now and it has held up super nicely with no loss of elasticity in the fabric. What I love about this most is you could dress up this top to create a nice outfit. It's a very versatile piece and I currently have this in three colors and the same great quality with all of them.”2-in-1 Sports BraCRZ YOGA Butterluxe Square Neck Longline Sports Bra Sometimes you just need a sports bra that doubles as your top! Plus, the square neckline is very on-trend. Sizes: 2XS-XLMaterialL: 81% Polyamide, 19% Lycra Customer review: “The fit was great and it didn’t give my 32DD bust even a hint of uniboob problems. Only thing that some people might dislike is even though it has removable cups if you have a tendency to nip out hard it will show through the cups a little.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPrinted Biker ShortsAoxjox Workout Biker Shorts, Tummy Control Who said activewear had to be boring? Check out these printed biker shorts that come in a ton fun prints and feature flattering seams above the booty. Sizes: 2XS-3XL Material: 75% Nylon, 25% SpandexCustomer review: “When I say these are my favorite work out shorts. They do not have a front seam so you don’t have to worry about it being uncomfortable while you’re moving around, and the waist seam is tight but not uncomfortable so they never slip down. They are not the slightest bit see though...not to mention how flattering they are, i have them in 6 colors.”Classic Shorts SetOLCHEE Seamless Acid Wash SetTake the guesswork out of getting dressed for the gym entirely by wearing a matching set, especially if you’re aiming to be at a class early in the morning. Sizes: XS-XLMaterial: ElasticCustomer review: “I have this in three colors now. The fabric is great, stretchy, and perfect for working out. I don't wear a sports bra underneath either, as there is plenty of support. I highly recommend!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRibbed Shorts SetNiyokki Ribbed Sports Bra and Shorts SetThis seamless bra and shorts set comes in eight sophisticated shades with a ribbed detail that gives way to just enough elasticity so it remains ridiculously comfortable while keeping you supported. Sizes: S-LMaterial: 90% Nylon, 10% ElastaneCustomer review: “It fits perfectly. It looked like I was photoshopped in real life. The top has padding in it so it will shape you and push you up, and the bottoms are very secure and will suck you in.”Shorts That Look Like a Skortluogongzi Flowy Exercise ShortsMaybe you’ve spotted these on TikTok, or maybe you haven’t, but we’re here to tell you: Get these shorts (they come in 10 different colors!). The flowy exterior is layered with fitted shorts underneath for a feminine skort effect, which we obviously love.Sizes: S-2XLMaterial: 87% Spandex, 13% NylonCustomer review: “Legit the softest shorts I own. They run a little small so size up! If you have a bigger butt they might ride up on you but they are so comfy.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThree-Piece SetIWEMEK 3-Piece Workout SetMany of the 33 color options here come with a three-piece set: bike shorts, a short-sleeve crop top, and a spaghetti strap sports bra. Reviewers mention the material is thick and compressive in the best possible ways. Sizes: S-LMaterial: 90% Nylon, 10% SpandexCustomer review: “An absolute must-get. This set is unbelievably comfortable, stretchy, and hugs your body in the best places.”Super-Soft Longline Sports BraThe Gym People Longline Sports BraIn the market for a top that is just as stylish in or out of the gym? This longline sports bra offering a flattering scoop neck and over a dozen color options may just be your answer. Also, some reviewers even note it’s just as soft as Lululemon’s popular Align alternative. Sizes: XS-2XLMaterial: 80% Polyamide, 20% SpandexCustomer review: “The fabric is so soft, stretchy, and opaque yet sleek enough where it won’t pill. The fabric hugs me in and doesn’t gape at my waist. There is a lot of structure to the top which aids in providing medium support and functionality to the top even without adjustable straps.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPocketed Running ShortsTHE GYM PEOPLE High Waisted Running Shorts Consider this high-waisted running short your newest summer essential. Not only is it lightweight with a mesh liner built in, but it’s also quick-drying, meaning you won’t feel sticky even after a long run. Best of all, it has zippered pockets.Sizes: XS-2XLMaterial: 90% Polyester, 10% SpandexCustomer review: “These shorts are perfect for running! They stayed in place the whole time.”Push-up TankArtfish Seamless Crop Tank TopYou won’t even need a sports bra since this tank does double duty with a built-in push-up to give you an extra oomph.Sizes: XS-LMaterial: Polyester, SpandexCustomer review: “The quality of this is just so perfect. I bought the white, and it is not sheer at all. It's a stretchy but totally not see through material. It hits my waist in just the right spot; it can either be an undershirt or a regular shirt. And the straps are just wide enough to be able to wear a regular bra with it.”
html:
Running Vest

33,000ft Lightweight Running Vest

If one of your resolutions going into the New Year involves getting more steps in (or joining a run club), you’ll need a warm vest to keep you going—especially as temperatures continue to dip.

Sizes: XS-3XL

Material: 100% Polyester

Customer review: “I found this to be a fabulous soft shell vest. I wanted a hunter-orange vest for safety on walks and am pleasantly surprised at what a perfect layer this is.”

Zip-Up Fleece Hoodie

Trendy Queen Zip Up Hoodies Fleece

Few things compare to how comforting and snuggly a fleece hoodie can be. You’ll reach for it even when you’re not going to the gym.

Sizes: S-XL

Material: 50% Polyester, 50% Cotton

Customer review: “Thick! Great quality. Super Soft and made very well. I purchased the beige, and I will definitely be trying another color soon. This item is a good price. Exactly as described. I washed and dried it as soon as it arrived. It launders well and no shrinking or peeling. The size is accurate. Perfect fit for a Small. I am 5’5” 115 lbs. it’s not too tight or too loose. The fit is as it should be. And the color is as pictured. I recommend buying this zip-up jacket. Perfect!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Biker Shorts

BALEAF Biker Shorts with Pockets

With over 55,000 five-star reviews, it’s safe to say that these shorts will be your new go-to pair. Customers rave about how soft they are and love the deep pockets, which are perfect for stashing your cell phone.

Sizes: XS-3XL

Material: 87% Polyester, 13% Spandex

Customer review: “I love absolutely everything about these shorts! You can tell by the feel that they choose quality fabrics, and they are super soft against the skin, the compression is great for everyday wear and working out! They’re very flattering, the length is just enough.”

Tummy Control Leggings

90 Degree By Reflex High Waist Tummy Control Shapewear

These leggings not only offer tummy control but they’re also super durable, meaning they won’t let you down or become translucent even after several washes.

Sizes: XS-3XL

Material: 87% Polyester, 13% Spandex

Customer review: “The are comfortable, soft, breathable, and just the right amount of elasticity. Perfect for wearing to the gym, going on walks, and around the house. Side note - I absolutely LOVE the little pocket on the belly - perfect for holding a key and ID for the gym (not a great size for your phone though.)”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Quick Dry Top

Real Essentials Quick Dry Fit Athletic Top

You can never have too many tees, especially when you can wear them to yoga and to run errands. These come in a pack of five so you won’t run out, even when you skip laundry for a few extra days.

Sizes: S-XL

Material: 90% Polyester, 10% Spandex

Customer review: “I was skeptical about the quality for the price of these but they have far exceeded my expectations! They’re soft but sweat resistant and the colors are exactly as described. The material is thin but I live in a super humid climate, so this worked great for me.”

Long-Sleeve Tennis Dress

Hiverlay Long Sleeve Tennis Dresses

For those days when you can’t get an indoor court to play doubles, a long-sleeved tennis dress is a must. This one has built-in pockets and an adjustable half-zip collar to keep you comfortable.

Sizes: S-XL

Material: 90% Polyester, 10% Spandex

Customer review: “I was skeptical about the quality for the price of these but they have far exceeded my expectations! They’re soft but sweat-resistant, and the colors are exactly as described. The material is thin, but I live in a super humid climate, so this worked great for me.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Fleece Leggings

CRZ YOGA Thermal Fleece Lined Leggings

These fleece-lined leggings are so thin that you can even wear them under other pants as a thermal layer.

Sizes: XS-L

Material: Fleece Lined Thermal Fabric: 87% Polyamide,13% Spandex

Customer review: “My new winter must-have! At 5’4” and 128 lbs, the size small fits me perfectly—not too tight and not too loose. The 28-inch length is great, hitting just at my ankles, making them ideal for workouts, hiking, or just staying cozy during the colder months. The fleece lining is soft and warm without being bulky, and the leggings provide excellent stretch and comfort. I love the high-waisted design, which stays put during movement and adds a flattering touch. They’re also super versatile—great for yoga, running errands, or even layering under jeans on extra chilly days.”

Ski Pants

BenBoy Fleece Slim Cargo Snow Ski Hiking Pants

Skiing absolutely qualifies as a workout, and this pair of cargo pants is perfect for both hitting the slopes and tackling hiking trails. Even if you don’t make it to the mountain, they’re ideal for enjoying the great outdoors.

Sizes: XS-L

Material: Fleece Lined Thermal Fabric: 87% Polyamide,13% Spandex

Customer review: “I’m super picky with pants, and these impressed me. They're super comfortable, warm, and versatile. They look great when worn casually or for winter sports. The inner lining keeps me warm and is non-irritating. Lots of pockets that fit my phone. Comes with a cute and adjustable belt. Won't make noise when walking. Material is waterproof and can be worn in snowy conditions. I don't want to take them off. Super happy with these pants. Would recommend.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Seamless Long-Sleeve Top

MathCat Seamless Workout Shirt Long Sleeve Yoga

Before you even begin to entertain the idea of exercising outside, you’ll need a warm base layer. This long-sleeve workout top is seamless, so it won’t peek through anything you layer on top.

Sizes: XS-L

Material: 90% Nylon, 10% Elastane

Customer review: “I love the material, feel, color, and fit of these longsleeves. They are definitely heavy enough to be a baselayer, and hold up GREAT. Perfect for any fitness activity or just hanging around. I'm actually wearing my light blue one right now LOL. It's that good!"

Mesh Leggings

TrainingGirl Mesh High Waisted Yoga Pants

Shake things up from the norm by swapping out your usual black leggings for this pair that features mesh paneling.

Sizes: XS-L

Material: 90% Nylon, 10% Elastane

Customer review: “I tried them on and don’t ever want to take them off again, these are the comfiest leggings I’ve had, the fabric is really soft and resistant they allow you to move freely ant they are really flattering to your body."

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

One-Shoulder Set

Aoxjox Asymmetric Sports Bras

If you’re tired of wearing the same old black sports bra to the gym, mix things up with a one-shoulder set that comes in over 20 colors, just in case you want to coordinate your sneakers to your outfit.

Sizes: XXS-3X

Material: 75% Nylon, 25% Spandex

Customer review: “Not only do I get SO many compliments when I wear this but it is very supportive (I do lots of HIIT work-outs). Have had this product for about a year now and it has held up super nicely with no loss of elasticity in the fabric. What I love about this most is you could dress up this top to create a nice outfit. It's a very versatile piece and I currently have this in three colors and the same great quality with all of them.”

2-in-1 Sports Bra

CRZ YOGA Butterluxe Square Neck Longline Sports Bra

Sometimes you just need a sports bra that doubles as your top! Plus, the square neckline is very on-trend.

Sizes: 2XS-XL

MaterialL: 81% Polyamide, 19% Lycra

Customer review: “The fit was great and it didn’t give my 32DD bust even a hint of uniboob problems. Only thing that some people might dislike is even though it has removable cups if you have a tendency to nip out hard it will show through the cups a little.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Printed Biker Shorts

Aoxjox Workout Biker Shorts, Tummy Control

Who said activewear had to be boring? Check out these printed biker shorts that come in a ton fun prints and feature flattering seams above the booty.

Sizes: 2XS-3XL

Material: 75% Nylon, 25% Spandex

Customer review: “When I say these are my favorite work out shorts. They do not have a front seam so you don’t have to worry about it being uncomfortable while you’re moving around, and the waist seam is tight but not uncomfortable so they never slip down. They are not the slightest bit see though...not to mention how flattering they are, i have them in 6 colors.”

Classic Shorts Set

OLCHEE Seamless Acid Wash Set

Take the guesswork out of getting dressed for the gym entirely by wearing a matching set, especially if you’re aiming to be at a class early in the morning.

Sizes: XS-XL

Material: Elastic

Customer review: “I have this in three colors now. The fabric is great, stretchy, and perfect for working out. I don't wear a sports bra underneath either, as there is plenty of support. I highly recommend!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Ribbed Shorts Set

Niyokki Ribbed Sports Bra and Shorts Set

This seamless bra and shorts set comes in eight sophisticated shades with a ribbed detail that gives way to just enough elasticity so it remains ridiculously comfortable while keeping you supported.

Sizes: S-L

Material: 90% Nylon, 10% Elastane

Customer review: “It fits perfectly. It looked like I was photoshopped in real life. The top has padding in it so it will shape you and push you up, and the bottoms are very secure and will suck you in.”

Shorts That Look Like a Skort

luogongzi Flowy Exercise Shorts

Maybe you’ve spotted these on TikTok, or maybe you haven’t, but we’re here to tell you: Get these shorts (they come in 10 different colors!). The flowy exterior is layered with fitted shorts underneath for a feminine skort effect, which we obviously love.

Sizes: S-2XL

Material: 87% Spandex, 13% Nylon

Customer review: “Legit the softest shorts I own. They run a little small so size up! If you have a bigger butt they might ride up on you but they are so comfy.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Three-Piece Set

IWEMEK 3-Piece Workout Set

Many of the 33 color options here come with a three-piece set: bike shorts, a short-sleeve crop top, and a spaghetti strap sports bra. Reviewers mention the material is thick and compressive in the best possible ways.

Sizes: S-L

Material: 90% Nylon, 10% Spandex

Customer review: “An absolute must-get. This set is unbelievably comfortable, stretchy, and hugs your body in the best places.”

Super-Soft Longline Sports Bra

The Gym People Longline Sports Bra

In the market for a top that is just as stylish in or out of the gym? This longline sports bra offering a flattering scoop neck and over a dozen color options may just be your answer. Also, some reviewers even note it’s just as soft as Lululemon’s popular Align alternative.

Sizes: XS-2XL

Material: 80% Polyamide, 20% Spandex

Customer review: “The fabric is so soft, stretchy, and opaque yet sleek enough where it won’t pill. The fabric hugs me in and doesn’t gape at my waist. There is a lot of structure to the top which aids in providing medium support and functionality to the top even without adjustable straps.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pocketed Running Shorts

THE GYM PEOPLE High Waisted Running Shorts

Consider this high-waisted running short your newest summer essential. Not only is it lightweight with a mesh liner built in, but it’s also quick-drying, meaning you won’t feel sticky even after a long run. Best of all, it has zippered pockets.

Sizes: XS-2XL

Material: 90% Polyester, 10% Spandex

Customer review: “These shorts are perfect for running! They stayed in place the whole time.”

Push-up Tank

Artfish Seamless Crop Tank Top

You won’t even need a sports bra since this tank does double duty with a built-in push-up to give you an extra oomph.

Sizes: XS-L

Material: Polyester, Spandex

Customer review: “The quality of this is just so perfect. I bought the white, and it is not sheer at all. It's a stretchy but totally not see through material. It hits my waist in just the right spot; it can either be an undershirt or a regular shirt. And the straps are just wide enough to be able to wear a regular bra with it.”
